casebody.data:
Justo RICHARDS, petitioner,
v.
Bruce YELICH, Superintendent, Bare Hill Correctional Facility, et al. No. 13-6089. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 4, 2013.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for *522writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
